Articles.Content:
KAG is a 2D side scrolling game with different game modes, such as :

CTF

2 teams have a certain amount of time to make their fortifications safely , after that, they still can build but will be under siege by bomb gliding knights, or super quick tree climbing archers, you have a plethora of stragities to use, it\'s completely free. (Unless you want to pay 9.99 for the full version, which is (Like KSP) still in development.).
Looks so much like Terraria, like the details and everything, such as the tunnel illumination and stuff.
I\'ve played a little bit of it and it\'s pretty awesome. Little bit slow pace though.

I\'ve played a little bit of it and it\'s pretty awesome. Little bit slow pace though.

Get and stay on the front lines for long enough and you will think it\'s too fast.
